'''2.1.10837''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.1.10836''' ([[wikipedia:MacOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.10835''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on January 7, 2020.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-12200}} – Launcher window gets larger, and moves every time it is opened (Linux)
* {{bug|MCL-12594}} – Game output log fails to show exception stack traces
